info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-uac-actions-rpc - RPC Operations
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for uplink auto config RPC action data.
     Copyright (c) 2025 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

**Module:** `Cisco-IOS-XE-uac-actions-rpc`
**Version:** 2025-07-01
**Operations:** 1

post.summary:
In case the preferred uplink interface is down, device auto-selects a non-preferred
       interface for uplink. Once the preferred uplink interface is brought up, this RPC
       can be used to force the device to check cloud connectivity via preferred uplink
       interface and select it for uplink
post.description:
In case the preferred uplink interface is down, device auto-selects a non-preferred
       interface for uplink. Once the preferred uplink interface is brought up, this RPC
       can be used to force the device to check cloud connectivity via preferred uplink
       interface and select it for uplink

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/uac_actions_rpc:uac-prefer-uplink`
